import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import ToDoTask from './ToDoTask' import DoingTask from './DoingTask' import DoneTask from './DoneTask' import AddTaskDialog from './AddTaskDialog' const Tasks = ({todoTasks, doingTasks, doneTasks}) => { const [isDlgOpen, setIsDlgOpen] = useState(false); const openTaskDialog = () => { setIsDlgOpen(true) } return(
) } export default Tasks
